CBE_ChatColor.label: Chatbot chat color
CBE_ChatColor.tooltip: The color this chatbot uses in Twitch chat

CBE_UseChatColor.label: Use chat color
CBE_UseChatColor.tooltip: Defines, if the chat color is used for messages aswell

CBE_DebugMode.label: Debug mode
CBE_DebugMode.tooltip: If enabled, the timer for live duration will run even when not live

CBE_String_UnknownParameter.label: Unknown parameter (available tags: $param)
CBE_String_UnknownParameter.tooltip: This is shown, when a parameter is unknown

CBE_String_MissingParameter.label: Missing parameter
CBE_String_MissingParameter.tooltip: This is shown, when a parameter is missing

CBE_String_CooldownOnCooldown.value: !$command is still on cooldown for $cooldown seconds
CBE_String_CooldownOnCooldown.label: Command on cooldown response (available tags: $command, $cooldown)
CBE_String_CooldownOnCooldown.tooltip: The response if a triggered command in on cooldown

CBE_String_CooldownOnUserCooldown.value: !$command is still on cooldown for you for $cooldown seconds
CBE_String_CooldownOnUserCooldown.label: Command on user cooldown response (available tags: $command, $cooldown)
CBE_String_CooldownOnUserCooldown.tooltip: The response if a triggered command in on user cooldown

CBE_CommandsName.label: Name
CBE_CommandsName.tooltip: The command that lists all registered commands

CBE_CommandsIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
CBE_CommandsIsGlobal.tooltip: Is the cooldown global or user based?

CBE_CommandsDescription.label: Description
CBE_CommandsDescription.tooltip: The full description of this command

CBE_String_CommandJoin.label: Limiter
CBE_String_CommandJoin.tooltip: The string to use for separating commands

CBE_CooldownName.label: Name
CBE_CooldownName.tooltip: The command that shows the cooldown status

CBE_CooldownIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
CBE_CooldownIsGlobal.tooltip: Is the cooldown global or user based?

CBE_CooldownDescription.value: Shows current status of all commands
CBE_CooldownDescription.label: Description
CBE_CooldownDescription.tooltip: The full description of this command

CBE_String_CooldownFormat.label: Cooldown format (available tags: $command, $cooldown)
CBE_String_CooldownFormat.tooltip: The cooldown text format for a single command

CBE_String_CooldownNoCommandsOnCooldown.value: There are no commands on cooldown
CBE_String_CooldownNoCommandsOnCooldown.label: Text for non existing cooldown
CBE_String_CooldownNoCommandsOnCooldown.tooltip: The text that is shown when there are no commands on cooldown

CBE_String_CooldownCurrentlyOnCooldown.label: Text for global cooldown (available tags: $list)
CBE_String_CooldownCurrentlyOnCooldown.tooltip: The text that is shown for global cooldown when fetching cooldowns

CBE_String_CooldownCurrentlyOnUserCooldo.label: Text for user cooldown (available tags: $list)
CBE_String_CooldownCurrentlyOnUserCooldo.tooltip: The text that is shown for user cooldown when fetching cooldowns

CBE_String_CooldownJoin.label: Cooldown command separator
CBE_String_CooldownJoin.tooltip: The string used for separating commands on cooldown

CBE_HelpName.label: Name
CBE_HelpName.tooltip: The command that shows help for a command

CBE_HelpIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
CBE_HelpIsGlobal.tooltip: Is the cooldown global or user based?

CBE_HelpDescription.value: Shows help for the given command
CBE_HelpDescription.label: Description
CBE_HelpDescription.tooltip: The full description of this command

CBE_String_Help.label: Help text (available tags: $usage, $cooldown, $description)
CBE_String_Help.tooltip: The text that is shown when using the help command

CBE_String_HelpUnknown.label: Unknown command response (available tags: $command)
CBE_String_HelpUnknown.tooltip: The text that is shown when requesting help for an unknown command

CSW_CMDName.label: Command name
CSW_CMDName.tooltip: The command for listing CSW members

CSW_CMDIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
CSW_CMDIsGlobal.tooltip: Shows if this command has a global cooldown

CSW_CMDDescription.value: Zeigt die Mitglieder der CSW-Elite, die im Chat anwesend sind. Der Parameter "list" zeigt die gesamte CSW-Elite.
CSW_CMDDescription.label: Description

CSW_CMDComplete.label: Elite complete response
CSW_CMDComplete.tooltip: The text shown when all members are present

CSW_CMDNobody.value: Von der CSW-Elite ist leider noch keiner da...
CSW_CMDNobody.label: No one present response
CSW_CMDNobody.tooltip: The text shown when no member is present

CSW_CMDJoin.label: Members separator
CSW_CMDJoin.tooltip: The string used to separate members of the CSW elite

CSW_CMDCurrent.label: Current elite format (available tags: $list)
CSW_CMDCurrent.tooltip: The string formatted while showing the current CSW elite

CSW_CMDMissing.label: Missing members format (available tags: $list)
CSW_CMDMissing.tooltip: The string formatted while showing missing members

CSW_CMDPresent.value: Von der CSW-Elite sind folgende Leute anwesend: $list.
CSW_CMDPresent.label: Present members format (available tags: $list)
CSW_CMDPresent.tooltip: The string formatted while showing present members

CSW_CMDNotWritten.label: Present members (that have not written yet) format (available tags: $list)
CSW_CMDNotWritten.tooltip: The string formatted while showing present members that have not yet written

CSW_CMDPresentButNotWritten.value: Von der CSW-Elite sind folgende Leute anwesend: $list.
CSW_CMDPresentButNotWritten.label: Present members (that have not written yet and are all present members) format (available tags: $list)
CSW_CMDPresentButNotWritten.tooltip: The string formatted while showing present members that have not yet written (if that are all members that are present)

CSW_LinkName.label: Command name
CSW_LinkName.tooltip: The command for listing CSW members

CSW_LinkIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
CSW_LinkIsGlobal.tooltip: Shows if this command has a global cooldown

CSW_LinkDescription.value: Zeigt den Link zum Twitch-Kanal von Mitgliedern der CSW-Elite. Der Parameter "own" zeigt den Link zum eigenen Kanal, fall der Nutzer der CSW-Elite angehoert
CSW_LinkDescription.label: Description

CSW_LinkLessThanTwo.value: Aktuell sind weniger als 2 Leute Mitglied der CSW-Elite...
CSW_LinkLessThanTwo.label: Less than two members response
CSW_LinkLessThanTwo.tooltip: The text shown when there are less than two members in the CSW-Elite

CSW_LinkString.value: Hey, besucht mal den Kanal von $user: $link
CSW_LinkString.label: Link string (available tags: $user, $link)
CSW_LinkString.tooltip: The text shown when fetching a CSW-link

CSW_EventsName.label: Command name
CSW_EventsName.tooltip: The command for listing CSW events

CSW_EventsIsGlobal.label: Global cooldown
CSW_EventsIsGlobal.tooltip: Shows if this command has a global cooldown

CSW_EventsDescription.value: Zeigt die naechsten Termine des CSW-Streamings an
CSW_EventsDescription.label: Description

CSW_EventsMax.label: Maximum displayed events
CSW_EventsMax.tooltip: Shows how many events are listed at max per fetch

CSW_EventsJoin.label: Separator
CSW_EventsJoin.tooltip: The string used to separate events

CSW_EventsNoMore.value: Aktuell sind noch keine weiteren Termine geplant
CSW_EventsNoMore.label: No more events planned response
CSW_EventsNoMore.tooltip: The text shown when there are no further events planned

CSW_EventsError.value: Kann aktuell nicht auf Termine zugreifen...
CSW_EventsError.label: Error response
CSW_EventsError.tooltip: The text shown when an error occurs while accessing events

CSW_EventsTimedUpdate.label: Timed file write
CSW_EventsTimedUpdate.tooltip: The time interval in seconds, in which a formatted file is written

MK_Cost.label: Cost
MK_Cost.tooltip: The currency cost for triggering this command

MK_FreeForMods.label: Free for mods
MK_FreeForMods.tooltip: Is this command free for mods?

MK_NotEnoughCurrency.label: Response (not enough currency)

MK_Paid.tooltip: The response coming in chat, if the user successfully skips the song (use $user, $cost and $currencyname)
